name: Send Thankster cards from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically send a new card in Thankster. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1wzql8DegSuxW61SH0AmOkuU1ZB9Fj7SPFWKkXq1nrnQ/edit?usp=sharing).
